subject: Validation Result: S06 Leave Server Audit

validation_evidence.missing_file: scheduler/progress/melo-audit/s06-leave-server-audit.md does NOT exist despite being claimed

findings.notes: E2E test work is excellent quality with good TDD methodology. However, missing progress documentation and inaccurate screenshot claims indicate incomplete task. Worker should create missing documentation and correct claims before resubmission.

content.summary: S06 audit has good technical work but fails validation due to missing deliverables and inaccurate completion claims.
